name: Fantasy race
description: You were little more than a commoner who found a shimmering portal by accident and whose curiosity overtook them. Now you find yourself in the wilderness of a strange world with no way back to your own. What's more is that where there were signs of a civilization there's now only armies of undead. It would seem that this world suffered a necromantic catastrophe. Hopefully surviving here won't prove too much of a challenge.

name: Human
description: You are a member of the humans, a race known for farming, ingenuity, and war. They and their kingdoms can be found almost anywhere, but they seem to like the green plains more.

name: Kath
description: You are a member of the kath, a feline race whose capital resides in an eastern mountainous area known for its mists and bamboo.

name: Lupen
description: You are a member of the lupen, a canine race that lives in large tribal packs in the dense northern pine forests.

name: Lhizhar
description: You are a member of the lhizhar, a reptilian race whose capital resides in the southern great desert. They spend a lot of their time lounging in the sun when not training or working.

name: Ravian
description: You are a member of the Ravian, an avian race whose universal wish to fly like other birds have spurred on an inventive side that has led to them constructing great airships of wood and copper and are the dominant force of trade and piracy alike.

name: Phaloce
description: You are a member of the phaloce, a strange cephalopodic race who spends a lot of time in their underwater monastaries that light up parts of the ocean floor with an ominous green light coming from their stained glass windows.

name: Shar-mer
description: You are a member of the shar-mer, the shark-like fish people of the sea who are mostly known for their propensity to leave their enemies with nasty bite wounds. There is little that interests them that doesn't involve food, specifically meat.

name: Elf
description: You are a member of the elves, a race whose domain includes every forest known to man and extends even further into the unknown woods where no human has returned alive. Most don't take kindly to humans invading and devestating the forests which they have tended to for centuries.

name: Dwarf
description: You are a member of the dwarves, a race whose connection to the deep caves and tunnels of the earth is as set in stone as their homes. They prefer to be underground with a pickaxe if they can help it, and only rarely will you find one who is sick enough of being underground to travel the surface.

name: Venusian
description: You are a member of the venusians, a plant-like race with carnivorous and sapient-eating tendencies. They can subsist on the sun and nutrients and water from the soil but their hunger drives them to hunt for flesh no matter its source.

name: Ratten
description: You are a member of the ratten, a rat-like race known mostly for its tendency to be involved with underground activities, both literally and criminally. They are generally not on good terms with the mousen. Most seem attracted to the sewers of human cities as hideouts and the like, and can be commonly found there if not in the wild or in the shadier parts of town.

name: Mousen
description: You are a member of the mousen, a mouse-like race involved mostly in trade, scouting, and the delivery of messages. They are generally not on good terms with the ratten due to them souring relations between rodent folk and humans.

name: Ursa
description: You are a member of the ursa, a strong but reclusive race of bear people. They share territory with the lupen but they rarely clash and are generally on good terms with each other unless food scarcity becomes an issue.

name: Minotaur
description: You are a minotaur, a humanoid bovine race most commonly found on mountain ranges and in plains. While they don't have civilizations of their own as they've never needed one, they do tend to live and work with humans and thus are common in their cities too.

name: Anteris
description: You are a member of the anteris, an insectoid race who live in great hive communities both above and below ground. They have a propensity for sweet things and generally follow the orders of a matriarch, or a patriarch in the instance that no suitable to rule matriarchs are around.

name: Spinoire
description: You are a member of the spinoire, a race of reclusive arachnidians. Each one builds a nest for themselves in the wilds away from the others and generally their only contact with others is to eat those that have wandered into their web. The more social ones take to a travelling lifestyle or end up in cities as tailors if they've proven they won't eat the people there.
